actions.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 101-403, by Mr. Hall (OH).

Rule provides for consideration of H.R. 2570 with 1 hour of general debate. Previous question shall be considered as ordered without intervening motions except motion to recommit. Measure will be read by section. Bill is open to amendments. It shall be in order to consider the amendment in the nature of a substitute recommended by the Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs as an original bill for the purpose of amendment under the five-minute rule.
Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 92.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate.
The previous question was ordered without objection.
On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 386 - 0 (Roll no. 15).
Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

official_title: Providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 2570) to provide for the designation of certain public lands as wilderness in the State of Arizona.

summary.text: Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 2570 (Arizona wilderness).

titles.title: Providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 2570) to provide for the designation of certain public lands as wilderness in the State of Arizona.
